rules_text:
Foreshadow {13}. This costs {1} less for each nonland card in your graveyard. [i](You may cast this spell for its foreshadow cost. If you do, also trigger its “dies” ability when it enters.)[/i]
Flying, menace, trample
When The Wickerscreech of Gatstaf dies, destroy target nonland permanent an opponent controls.
